Responsibilities: We are looking for a tele sales and marketer . As a tele sales executive, you will be responsible for marketing and selling various IT products such as software, computers, printers, toner cartridges, etc. It will be necessary to provide clear information to customers about the details, quality, features, and prices of our products. Responsibilities: Must be proficient in computer usage and have a good understanding of MS Word, MS Excel, Social Media Management, Email Management, and Live Chatting Software . Plan and regularly monitor the company's presence on LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook and other social media platforms. Content writing for Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Website , and Email Marketing . Ensure adherence to company guidelines and design standards. Good knowledge about e-commerce business and IT sector is required.

Requirements: Training / Trade Course: Training must be obtained from any reputable IT institute . Additional Qualifications: Must have good conduct and proficiency in organizational and interpersonal communication skills . Priority will be given if knowledge of hardware and software maintenance is present. Must be creative, self-motivated, and have leadership qualities in teamwork. Must have a mindset to work in a fast-paced and deadline-oriented environment. Only female candidates can apply. Must have sufficient knowledge about IT products. Must be assertive, hardworking, smart, and honest.

company_address: Sharif Complex, 31/1, lift-9, purana paltan, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities of the job:
* Must be proficient in using a smartphone. Our work needs to be done through smartphones.
* All male and female citizens of Bangladesh can apply.
* Work at the district level. Work can also be done in many upazilas within the district. In that case, the responsibility will be given to the respective area with priority.
* Hiring will be done in major divisional cities such as Dhaka, Chittagong, Sylhet, Rajshahi, etc.
* Opportunity to work full-time/part-time.
* Workplace: Respective district headquarters.
* Work: Responsible for onboarding merchants in the area through the branches of Pubali Bank PLC.
* Monthly targets are set, and there are bonuses for achieving targets.
* Salary and bonus for skilled individuals will be determined based on performance.
* Both skilled and unskilled individuals can apply.
* Candidates who have worked in various companies in the field will be given priority. Candidates who have fulfilled the responsibilities of various companies at the field level are preferred.

‚òÖ There is no need for previous applicants to reapply. However, they can attend interviews during office hours.
‚òÖ Candidates must have the necessary documents.
‚òÖ Age limit: Minimum 18 years.
‚òÖ National ID card is required.
‚òÖ SSC pass certificate/marksheet is required. A passport size photo will be needed.

‚û§ Interview time at the office: Every day from 10:00 am to 4:00 pm except government holidays. Support will be available on the mobile number from 10:00 am to 8:00 pm except prayer times. However, text on WhatsApp to the Banglalink number without calling. You will receive a reply, InshaAllah.

‚û§ Interviews will be conducted every Saturday morning at 10:00 am. InshaAllah.

‚û§ Office address: 31/1, Sharif Complex, 10th floor, Purana Paltan, Dhaka-1000.

company_address: Sharif Complex, 31/1, lift-9, purana paltan, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities of the job:
* Must be proficient in using a smartphone. Our work needs to be done through smartphones.
* All male and female citizens of Bangladesh can apply.
* At least one person per district and multiple people in the divisional cities will be hired.
* Workplaces: Work in divisional and district cities. Form skilled teams in divisional and district cities, train the teams, monitor and supervise the teams.
* Priority will be given to candidates who have worked in various companies in the field. Priority will be given to candidates who have fulfilled responsibilities of various companies at the field level. Priority in responsibilities is given to their own division and district.
* Work: Collaborate with the team to onboard Merchants in the area through the branches of Pubali Bank PLC. Monthly targets are set, and bonuses are available for target achievement. Salary and bonus discussions will be determined based on the skills of the candidates.
* Skilled and unskilled, everyone can apply.
* Candidates who are entrepreneurial, hardworking, and willing to take on challenges are preferred. Being transparent in dealing with clients, managing, and explaining are important qualities.

‚òÖ There is no need for re-applying for applicants who have applied before. However, they can attend interviews during office hours.
‚òÖ The candidate must have the necessary documents.
‚òÖ Age limit: Minimum 18 years.
‚òÖ National identity card is required.
‚òÖ Bachelor's/Master's pass certificate/transcript is required. A passport-sized photo is required.
Educational qualifications are essential for skilled candidates.

‚û§ Interview time at the office: Except for government holidays, every day from 10:00 am to 4:00 pm. Support will be available on the mobile number from 10:00 am to 8:00 pm, except during prayer times. However, text on WhatsApp to the Banglalink number without calling. You will receive a reply. InshaAllah.
‚û§ Interviews will be conducted every Saturday morning at 10:00 am. InshaAllah.

‚û§ Office address: 31/1, Sharif Complex, 10th Floor, Purana Paltan, Dhaka-1000.

Responsibilities: Provide customers with accurate information about products and services over the phone. Create new customers and achieve sales targets. Provide answers to customer queries and resolve issues. Prepare daily sales reports and share with management. Must know how to enter parcels in the courier system. Must have experience in solving all types of issues related to courier services. Must have a good understanding of courier booking.

Requirements: For tele-sales related work, at least 1 year of experience is required. Good understanding of courier service and order management is necessary. Initiative is required to achieve targets. Mental attitude to work under pressure is necessary. Good communication skills and positive attitude are required. Salary: Monthly 12,000 taka + attractive commission Working Hours: Day Shift: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM (for both male and female candidates) Night Shift: 7:00 PM - 5:00 AM (only for male candidates) Note: Preference will be given to candidates residing in the areas of Trimohoni, Nandipara, Dakkhin Banasree, Basabo, Khilgaon, Rampura, Aftabnagar, Badda. Office Address: 28/B, Taheriya Madrasa Road, Trimohoni, Khilgaon, Dhaka.

company_address: House No: 1-15, Road No: 14, Uttara, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Magura Telecom is a trusted mobile buying and selling company located in Uttara. Here, mobile handsets, accessories, headphones, chargers, and second-hand mobile phones are available at affordable prices. We are looking for sales representatives to sell products in the store. Inform incoming customers courteously and provide product suggestions as needed. Provide accurate information to customers about mobile phones, accessories, and features of various brands. Actively work towards achieving daily/monthly sales targets. Properly arrange and display products in the store and maintain the display. Handle cash, bKash, cash, or other payment systems correctly at the end of sales. Keep product stock updated and inform about stock requisition when necessary. Resolve customer complaints in a friendly manner or inform the appropriate authority. Maintain cleanliness and hygiene in the store and use branding tools correctly. Inform customers about new models, offers, discounts, and promotions. Maintain accurate records of customer information in the register (if applicable). Work following safety, product security, and company policies in the store. Work as a team with colleagues and follow management directions.

About Us: Safa Gift Shop operates as an integral part of Asther Hat. For the past three years, it has been serving both Bangladeshi and international clients with a diverse range of gift items. Our goal is to make every special occasion memorable and to become the preferred choice for our customers.

Key Responsibilities

- Communicate professionally with customers via Messenger.
- Bangla & English typing with customers.
- Provide detailed product information and follow up to drive sales.
- Maintain accurate daily call logs, reports, and customer records.
- Resolve customer issues promptly and efficiently.
- Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction and create positive experiences.
- Collaborate with support and operations teams to ensure smooth interactions.
- Assist with additional administrative or operational tasks as needed.
- Report daily activities to the team leader or supervisor.

Responsibilities: - Prospect and acquire qualified students interested in studying abroad and guide them to suitable educational institutions based on their needs.

- Manage a portfolio of student accounts to ensure long-term success and maintain strong client relationships.
- Ensure high levels of customer interaction, conversion, and lead generation.
- Develop and implement promotional strategies to promote Connected Education services.
- Prepare and submit regular reports on account status and transactions.
- Communicate with higher education institutions on behalf of students.
- Generate new business opportunities through existing and potential customer networks.
- Collaborate with Management and Marketing teams to improve sales performance and identify growth opportunities.
- Perform additional tasks and projects as assigned by management.

- 2-3 years of relevant experience in sales/business development
- Experience in education consultancy or study abroad services will be an advantage

Responsibilities: Job Summary:
The HR Manager is responsible for planning, developing, and managing human resource functions to support organizational goals. This role ensures effective recruitment, employee relations, performance management, compliance, and HR policy implementation.

Key Responsibilities:
* Develop and implement HR policies, procedures, and systems
* Manage end-to-end recruitment and selection process
* Handle employee onboarding, confirmation, and exit procedures
* Maintain employee records, attendance, leave, and HR documentation
* Oversee performance appraisal and employee development programs
* Ensure compliance with labor laws and company regulations
* Coordinate payroll, benefits, and compensation activities
* Address employee grievances and maintain healthy workplace relations
* Conduct disciplinary actions and internal investigations
* Plan and organize training and development programs
* Advise management on HR strategies and workforce planning

Required Qualifications:
* MBA in HR management.

Requirements: Experience:
* Minimum 3-5 years of experience in HR functions
* Previous experience as an HR Manager or Senior HR Executive preferred
Skills & Competencies:
* Strong knowledge of labor laws and HR practices
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Leadership and conflict resolution abilities
* Strong organizational and time management skills
* Proficiency in MS Office and HR software
* High level of confidentiality and professionalism
Working Conditions:
* Full-time office-based position
* Requires coordination with all departments
Salary Range:
30,000-50,000 
2 festival bonuses 
And other facilities according to company rule

Responsibilities: Future Cloud Bangladesh Limited (FCBL) is a reputed multinational ITES company operating for over 11 years. We are pleased to offer full-time job opportunities for potential candidates willing to work at night shift. Males are encouraged to apply for the same position. FCBL has an amazing workplace at the heart of the town, Banani, for male staff.

Job Responsibilities
- Executing daily voice operations and successfully generating high-quality warm leads across multiple outbound telemarketing campaigns.
- Improving and operating specialized North American real estate management initiatives, primarily focusing on initial portfolio onboarding and management.
- Reviewing daily performance reports to identify discrepancies, revenue leakages, and operational errors for formal presentation to the higher management.
- Liaising with probationary personnel to identify performance obstacles and facilitate seamless cultural integration during the initial onboarding phase.
- Identifying interpersonal or departmental conflicts, developing comprehensive resolution frameworks, and preparing strategic recommendations.
- Researching psychological motivation and emotional triggers to develop, pilot, and refine strategic engagement methodologies for diverse team environments.
- Performing internal audits to mitigate opportunity loss, bridge communication voids, and uphold superior standards for internal and external stakeholder collaboration.

Employment Status
Full-time

Job Location
Dhaka

Compensation & Other Benefits
- On-time salary
- Monthly recreation based on performance
- Yearly recreation based on performance
- Unlimited NESCAF√â
- Yearly 10 paid holidays
- Yearly 15 casual paid leaves
- All employees get loan facilities, including probationary employees
- Employees, their parents, spouses & children get a 35% discount in Ibn Sina Hospital
- Company sponsored 3 Annual programs

Read Before Apply
Go to https://online-voice-recorder.com and record your voice for at least 2-3 minutes with an introduction on yourself (you can speak about yourself, your education, experience, expertise, family, friends, hobbies & etc). The recording of your introduction must be in English. Save the audio file. You can use any other audio recording software too.

Send an email to apply@futurecloudbd.com with an attachment of your resume and the audio recording. Keep in mind the voice recording is to verify you are fluent in speaking English, so give your best try in that audio.

job_title: Production Assistant ‚Äì Premium Chocolate & Pastry Brand
job_description:
Responsibilities: Key Responsibilities

- Production Support: Assist the production team in crafting high-quality chocolates and pastries under professional guidance.
- Batching & Preparation: Precisely measure, weigh, and organize ingredients for production batches according to established recipes.
- Packaging & Quality Control: Carefully pack finished products in premium packaging, ensuring they are aesthetically presented and ready for delivery.
- Workplace Hygiene: Maintain strict hygiene and cleanliness standards in the workspace to ensure a food-safe environment.
- Tool & Equipment Handling: Handle delicate kitchen tools and machinery with care, ensuring they are cleaned and stored properly after use.

Operational Support: Support daily logistics and operational tasks to ensure a smooth production flow from start to finish.

Requirements: Safety & Compliance

- Strict Sanitation: Adhere to all personal hygiene protocols, including the mandatory use of hairnets, gloves, and aprons.
- Equipment Safety: Follow safety instructions carefully when operating machinery or handling sharp/hot equipment.
- Safe Handling: Practice safe ingredient storage and handling to prevent cross-contamination.
- Environmental Safety: Maintain a clutter-free workspace to prevent accidents and ensure a safe working environment for the whole team.

Candidate Profile

- Attitude: Honest, punctual, and highly disciplined.
- Education: Minimum SSC preferred.
- Experience: Previous kitchen, bakery, or packing experience is a plus, but freshers are highly encouraged to apply.
- Training: Full professional training will be provided.

What We Offer

- Competitive entry-level salary.
- Hands-on skill development in a premium work environment.
- Long-term career growth opportunities.

Key Responsibilities Production Support: Assist the production team in crafting high-quality chocolates and pastries under professional guidance. Batching & Preparation: Precisely measure, weigh, and organize ingredients for production batches according to established recipes. Packaging & Quality Control: Carefully pack finished products in premium packaging, ensuring they are aesthetically presented and ready for delivery. Workplace Hygiene: Maintain strict hygiene and cleanliness standards in the workspace to ensure a food-safe environment. Tool & Equipment Handling: Handle delicate kitchen tools and machinery with care, ensuring they are cleaned and stored properly after use. Operational Support: Support daily logistics and operational tasks to ensure a smooth production flow from start to finish.

company_address: House# 79, 6th Floor, New Airport Road,Banani,Chairman Bari, Dhaka, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: 1. Client Engagement (Relationship Building):
Understanding the needs and expectations related to visa processing of clients, creating and maintaining a good relationship with them.
Maintaining direct communication with clients and guiding them through the entire visa application process, providing solutions to any questions or issues.

2. Marketing Strategy Development:
Collaborating with the marketing team to create and implement effective marketing plans to attract new clients.
Analyzing market trends and competitors' activities to identify opportunities for improvement.

3. Service Promotion:
Creating attractive brochures, presentations, and social media content in simple language to explain the benefits of visa processing services.
Creating awareness among potential clients through promotional events, webinars, and workshops.

4. Analysis of Client Needs:
Understanding the needs of each client and customizing services accordingly to make them feel valued.
Providing detailed information about visa types, timelines, required documents, and potential challenges.

5. Time Management and Process Optimization:
Creating a specific timeline for each client's visa process and providing regular updates.
Collaborating with the internal team to streamline the entire process for ease and efficiency.

6. Feedback and Improvement:
Collecting and analyzing client feedback to determine areas for service improvement.
Implementing changes based on feedback to enhance client satisfaction and trust.

7. Reporting and Analytics:
Generating regular reports on marketing performance, client numbers, and satisfaction.
Verifying the success of marketing campaigns through data analysis and making decisions for future planning accordingly.

Requirements: Proficient communication skills (in both Bengali and English) Prior experience in visa processing or client service is advantageous Mentality to engage with clients in a professional and empathetic manner Interest and experience in marketing strategy and event management Proficiency in social media, presentation, and content creation Must be skilled in time management and multitasking A proactive and focused mindset in problem-solving Understanding of data analysis and reporting is required Interest in participating in and managing events, workshops, or webinars Commitment to long-term work and dedication to professional development

Responsibilities: Job Responsibilities: - Lead Generation & Telemarketing: Making outbound calls to prospective clients daily to introduce company projects and services. Clearly communicating product details to generate interest.
- Appointment Scheduling: Convincing potential clients over the phone and fixing scheduled appointments or meetings for the sales team.
- VIP Client Management: Meeting VIP and Corporate clients at the office or project sites. You must present yourself as the face of the company with a well-groomed appearance.
- Sales & Negotiation: conducting presentations, negotiating prices, and closing sales deals to achieve monthly targets.
- Follow-up & Relationship Building: Maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients through regular follow-ups via phone, WhatsApp, and Email.
- Documentation & Reporting: Drafting professional emails, maintaining client databases in MS Excel, and submitting daily work reports to the management.
- Field Work: Willingness to visit project sites or client offices when necessary to facilitate sales.

Requirements: ```html Additional Requirements Age 22 to 28 years Communication Skills: Must have fluent communication skills in both Bangla & English with a clear and confident voice. Appearance: Must be smart, good-looking, and well-groomed/presentable (essential for interacting with high-profile clients). Attitude: Must be energetic, target-oriented, and hardworking. Flexibility: Must have the mentality to work extra hours occasionally outside of standard office time if required by the business or for urgent client meetings. Tech Skills: Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel), Email drafting, and WhatsApp communication is required. ```

company_address: House-09, Road No-1/B, L Block, Banani Chairman Bari, Dhaka, 1st Floor
job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities:
- Welcome and assist customers at the restaurant in a friendly manner.
- Maintain cleanliness of tables, chairs, and dining area.
- Keep the floor, counter, and customer service area tidy at all times.
- Assist in food serving and packaging.
- Work as a kitchen helper.
- Assist in food preparation.
- Ensure proper packaging of food.
- Adhere to kitchen health and safety regulations.
- Keep the kitchen and workstations clean at the end of the shift.
- Willingness to take on any additional tasks assigned by the company.
- Participate in teamwork and cooperate with colleagues.

Qualifications:
- No prior experience required, training will be provided.
- Must be polite, responsible, and eager to learn.
- Must have a positive attitude towards working shifts, weekly offs, and public holidays.
- Must maintain physical health and be hardworking.

Benefits:
- Salary of 11,000 BDT per month.
- Daily allowance of 140 BDT (outside of salary).
- Free accommodation.
- 2 annual bonuses.
- 1 day off per week.
- Opportunity for a salary increase at the beginning of the year.
- Promotion opportunities.

Working Hours: 12 hours per day

To apply, message on WhatsApp - 01896107730

Responsibilities: Job Description

Job Title: Junior Sales Executive
Location: Green Tiger Electric Vehicle Limited
Job Type: Full-Time

Job Summary:
Green Tiger Electric Vehicle Limited is seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Junior Sales Executive to support sales growth, manage customer relationships, handle customer service activities, and ensure smooth order processing and payment coordination.

Key Responsibilities:
- Identify and acquire new customers through field visits, phone calls, and online platforms.
- Manage and follow up on online and offline leads to convert them into sales.
- Present and demonstrate product features, pricing, and benefits to customers.
- Maintain regular communication with existing customers and ensure repeat business.
- Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and service issues professionally and promptly.
- Process customer orders, prepare necessary documentation, and coordinate delivery schedules.
- Collect payments, confirm transactions, prepare invoices, and submit payment details to the accounts department.
- Maintain accurate records of customer information, sales activities, transactions, and complaints.
- Coordinate with internal departments such as production, accounts, service, and logistics for smooth operations.
- Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to support sales strategies.
- Prepare and submit daily, weekly, and monthly sales and customer service reports.
- Support promotional activities, campaigns, and product launches when required.
- Assist in after-sales service follow-up to ensure customer satisfaction and retention.

Qualifications and Skills:
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (preferred).
- Proficiency in MS Word and Excel is required.
- Proficient typing skills in both Bengali and English are required.
- Prior experience in sales or customer support is mandatory.
- Strong communication, negotiation, and customer handling skills.
- Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.
- Familiarity with CRM software and digital tools will be an advantage.

Key Attributes:
- Strong sense of responsibility and professionalism.
- Excellent customer service mindset with a positive attitude.
- Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
- Proactive, self-motivated, and target-oriented.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Good time management and multitasking ability.
- Attention to detail and commitment to quality work.
- Willingness to learn, adapt, and grow within the organization.

Salary:
Negotiable (Based on experience and qualifications)

Benefits & Compensation:
- Performance-based Incentives
- Subsidized Lunch Facility
- Monthly Mobile Bill Allowance
- Two Eid Bonuses per year
- Annual Salary Increment

Career Growth & Development:
- Clear career progression path
- Training and skill development opportunities
- Performance-based promotions

Apply with CV at: recruitment@greentiger.com.bd

Responsibilities: The Call Centre Agent is responsible for handling inbound and outbound calls, responding to customer inquiries, providing product or service information, and ensuring customer satisfaction through effective communication and problem-solving. The role requires professionalism, patience, and efficiency in managing a high volume of interactions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Handle inbound and outbound calls in a professional and courteous manner.
- Respond to customer inquiries, complaints, and requests promptly and accurately.
- Provide detailed information about products, services, or company policies.
- Maintain accurate records of customer interactions in the CRM system.
- Follow communication scripts and standard operating procedures (SOPs).
- Escalate complex issues to the supervisor or relevant department when necessary.
- Meet or exceed daily, weekly, and monthly performance targets (e.g., call volume, response time, customer satisfaction).
- Participate in training sessions to enhance product knowledge and communication skills.
- Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information responsibly.
- Contribute to a positive team environment and support colleagues as needed.

For example: 61 liters sold ‚Üí 61 x 4 = 244 BDT, 100 liters sold ‚Üí 100 x 4 = 400 BDT. This will be calculated on a daily basis and considered as additional income to the salary. Increment: Special increments will be available based on sales performance and achieving specified sales targets. Other benefits: Festival bonus and other benefits as per company policy Earning 18,000 - 21,000+ BDT per month is possible by selling 80-100 liters on average. More sales = more income ```

With over 155 years of experience, operating in more than 40 countries worldwide, and holding a prominent position in Bangladesh for over 70 years, American financial organization MetLife offers a golden opportunity to build a career as a Financial Associate.

Responsibilities:

- Finding new customers and establishing communication with them
- Creating appropriate insurance and savings plans based on the customer's income source, future plans, and preferences
- Regularly following up with existing customers and ensuring their satisfaction
- Providing correct guidance on financial security and investment plans for customers

- Managing marketing activities to enhance brand value
- Building long-term relationships with customers and providing financial solutions for their families
- Actively participating in company training, workshops, and developmental programs

Responsibilities: We are looking for a skilled Web Developer (Laravel) with a minimum of 2 years of professional experience in developing robust, scalable web applications. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performance backend and web solutions using the Laravel framework, ensuring smooth integration with frontend components, databases, and third-party services.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop, maintain, and optimize web applications using the Laravel (PHP) framework.
- Write clean, secure, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices and Laravel standards.
- Collaborate with UI/UX designers, product managers, and frontend developers to implement new features.
- Design and integrate RESTful APIs for web and mobile applications.
- Ensure application performance, security, scalability, and reliability.
- Work with databases such as MySQL / PostgreSQL, including query optimization.
- Debug, troubleshoot, and fix application issues; continuously improve system performance.
- Implement authentication, authorization, and role-based access control.
- Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and maintain coding standards.
- Stay up to date with the latest Laravel, PHP, and web development trends.

Requirements: - Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
- Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computing & Information System
- Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Engineering
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computing & Information System

Responsibilities: We are a leading manpower recruitment agency looking for a dynamic, energetic, and self-motivated Female Executive to join our team. If you have excellent communication skills and a knack for digital marketing, we want to hear from you!

Requirements: Key responsibilities and deliverables
- Manage end-to-end customer interactions across channels: handle inbound and outbound calls, social media messages, and direct inquiries; follow up promptly to convert leads and resolve issues.
- Develop, implement and maintain a content calendar for social platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn), including post concepts, captions, visuals, and publishing schedule.
- Execute community management: respond to comments, moderate conversations, escalate complaints, and maintain a positive brand voice online.
- Support digital campaign setup and monitoring: assist with organic campaigns, coordinate with paid advertising teams, prepare ad copy suggestions, and track basic campaign metrics.
- Maintain accurate records in CRM or lead-tracking tools: log conversations, update lead status, set reminders, and produce basic follow-up reports.
- Collaborate with internal teams (sales, recruitment, creative) to align messaging, share feedback from customers, and refine lead nurturing strategies.
- Contribute to performance improvement by suggesting A/B tests for posts/ads, refining targeting, and documenting what content formats drive the best engagement.

Required technical skills
- Social media management: hands-on experience publishing posts, scheduling content, and monitoring engagement across major platforms (examples: Facebook Business Suite, Creator Studio, Instagram tools).
- Content creation basics: ability to write clear, audience-appropriate captions and produce simple visual assets (examples: Canva, basic image editing); knowledge of post format best practices for engagement.
- Analytics and reporting: familiarity with basic metrics (reach, impressions, engagement rate, click-through, conversion indicators) and ability to compile simple weekly performance summaries using spreadsheets or dashboards.
- CRM and lead management: experience with lead logging, follow-up workflows, and simple segmentation (examples: HubSpot, Zoho, Google Sheets-based trackers).
- Digital communication tools: comfortable using email, chat platforms, video calls, and phone systems; ability to maintain professional written and verbal records of interactions.
- Basic technical literacy: comfortable learning new SaaS tools, troubleshooting common issues (login, permissions, media upload), and following step-by-step platform guides.
- Lead response time and follow-up completion rate.
- Engagement metrics for social content (likes, comments, shares, saves) and follower growth trends.
- Conversion or qualification rate from social and tele-outreach to next-stage action (appointment, application, demo).
- Accuracy and completeness of CRM records and timely reporting o

job_title: SIEM Engineer ‚Äì SOC Tooling & Detection Enablement
job_description:
Responsibilities: Job profile
The SIEM Engineer owns the design, implementation, and health of the SOC monitoring platform(s), ensuring reliable log collection, normalization, alerting, dashboards, and retention across ASA entities. The role partners with SOC analysts to enable effective detections and supports continuous tuning to improve fidelity and coverage.

Responsibilities
- SIEM Platform Operations: Install/configure and maintain SIEM components (e.g., Wazuh manager/indexer/dashboards), ensure availability, performance, and secure configuration.
- Log Source Onboarding: Onboard and maintain telemetry from endpoints/servers, identity providers, email systems, firewalls/VPNs, network devices, and critical applications; validate log completeness and parsing.
- Detection Engineering Support: Create, tune, and maintain detection rules/use cases; optimize for reduced false positives and improved detection of high-risk scenarios.
- Dashboards & Reporting: Build operational and executive dashboards; enable scheduled reporting for SOC KPIs and risk insights.
- Data Management: Manage retention, indexing, storage capacity planning, and data integrity; ensure time synchronization and consistent log formats.
- Automation & Integrations: Integrate SIEM with ticketing/case management, EDR, and other tools to support workflow automation and enrichment (where available).
- Documentation & Standards: Maintain documentation for architecture, log source inventory, parsing, rule sets, and operating procedures; support audit evidence requests.
- Continuous Improvement: Identify telemetry gaps, propose improvements, and support rollout of monitoring standards across countries.

Core competencies
- Strong engineering discipline and troubleshooting capability.
- Ability to translate detection requirements into technical configurations.
- Good stakeholder collaboration: works effectively with analysts and IT teams to onboard logs and resolve issues.
- Documentation discipline and attention to detail.

Compensation & Benefits:
- Competitive and attractive salary package will be offered to deserving candidates based on experience and skill set.
- Festival Bonus
- Provident Fund & Gratuity
- Life & Health Insurance (IPD & OPD)
- Annual Health Check-up
- Baisakhi Allowance
- Vehicle Loan Scheme / Vehicle Maintenance Allowance

Requirements: Required knowledge and Technical Skills

- Hands-on SIEM administration and engineering.
- Log collection agents, syslog, Windows Event Forwarding concepts, and parsing/normalization.
- Linux administration, scripting (Python/Bash), and basic network troubleshooting.
- Understanding of common security telemetry sources (EDR, IAM/M365, firewalls, proxies, DNS) and how to use them for detection.
- Secure hardening practices for SIEM infrastructure and supporting components.

Education and Experience:

- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Cyber Security/ Engineering/IT/Information Security or similar.
- 4‚Äì8 years‚Äô experience in SIEM/monitoring eng

Responsibilities: Responsibilities
‚ñ∏ SOC Operations & Governance: Establish and run SOC processes (24/7 or 8x5 + on-call), shift handovers, case management standards, and escalation paths.
‚ñ∏ Incident Response Management: Lead and coordinate incident response activities across entities; run incident bridges, ensure evidence capture, and drive root-cause analysis and post-incident reviews.
‚ñ∏ Stakeholder Management: Interface with local IT teams, Risk/Compliance, and senior management; provide clear updates during incidents and routine operational reporting.
Career at ASA International
Career at ASA International Dhaka, Bangladesh
‚ñ∏ Detection & Monitoring Oversight: Ensure high reliability alerting by overseeing SIEM content, use-case coverage (e.g., privileged access abuse, malware, suspicious logins, data exfiltration), and noise reduction.
‚ñ∏ Platform Ownership (oversight): Ensure SOC tooling health and coverage (SIEM, EDR/XDR, email security, identity logs, network/security devices), including onboarding of critical log sources and maintaining documentation.
‚ñ∏ Threat & Vulnerability Alignment: Work with Vulnerability Management and relevant teams to ensure detection and response is aligned to critical vulnerabilities, emerging threats, and risk priorities.
‚ñ∏ Quality Assurance: Review investigation quality, closure codes, and adherence to SOPs/playbooks; coach analysts and enforce consistent standards.
‚ñ∏ Metrics & Continuous Improvement: Own SOC KPIs (MTTA/MTTR, alert-to-incident ratio, false positive rate, coverage), drive improvements, and support audit/regulator evidence requests.
‚ñ∏ People Leadership: Train and mentor L1/L2 analysts; manage performance goals, shift rotas, and professional development.

Core competencies
‚ñ∏ Security Skills: Firewall Configuration, Policy Creating, Access Control List (ACL), VPN, SSL VPN, IPSEC VPN, URL filtering, Application Control, Web Application firewall operation, Privilege Access Management (PAM), SIEM, Two factor authentication, (2FA), VAPT tools, Load Balancing, Bandwidth Control, SSL Certificate report and log monitoring, regular configuration Backup and restore. Centralized Antivirus Operation, report, Control, Group Management. Web SSL certificate deployment etc.
‚ñ∏ System Deployment Knowledge: Installing and configuring Windows Server, Operation, Log/Event Check, Monitoring, data backup, OS update etc. Managing Clustered System, Guest VM monitoring. Good understanding of Virtualization, System Design, Plan, MPIO, ISCSI etc.
‚ñ∏ Network-System Design: Making Network Diagram, Creating and Making IP Plan, Product Selection for network, server and consumer products.
‚ñ∏ Networking Skills: Layer 2 and Layer 3 Switch configuration, Skills on SSH, VLAN, Inter VLAN Routing, Spanning Tree, Routing Protocol (static and dynamic), Device Hardening, GRE Tunnel, IPSec VPN, Interfaces, Device Configuration backup and restore etc.
‚ñ∏ Licensing and Subscription: Windows OS (Server and PC) licensing, Microsoft Office Licensi

Responsibilities: Core Responsibilities
- Handle day-to-day accounting (cash, bank, petty cash, journals)
- Prepare event-wise budgets and track actual vs planned cost
- Manage vendor bills, advances, and final settlements
- Issue client invoices and follow up for payments (this is critical)
- Maintain receivables & payables reports

Event-Specific Duties
- Control event-wise expense tracking (fabrication, manpower, logistics, F&B, artists, etc.)
- Verify vendor quotations, PO, and bills before payment
- Ensure on-site cash disbursement is documented properly
- Close accounts event-by-event after execution

Financial Control & Compliance
- Maintain VAT, Tax, TDS records
- Assist in monthly closing & audit support
- Ensure company policies are followed in spending
- Maintain proper bill files & digital records

Coordination & Reporting
- Coordinate with Project Managers & Operations team
- Prepare profit/loss reports per event
- Submit management financial reports
- Support decision-making with cost insights

Tools & Skills Expected
- Strong in Excel / Google Sheets
- Knowledge of Tally / accounting software
- Good understanding of event costing
- Detail-oriented, deadline-driven mindset

Requirements: Requirements
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Accounting / Finance / Business Administration
- 2‚Äì4 years experience in accounts (event/agency experience = big plus)
- Strong knowledge of basic accounting principles
- Hands-on experience with Tally / accounting software
- Excellent command over MS Excel / Google Sheets
- Ability to manage event-wise costing & expense tracking
- Knowledge of VAT, Tax & compliance (practical, not textbook)
- Experience handling vendor bills, payments & client invoicing
- Strong attention to detail and accuracy
- Ability to work under tight deadlines & pressure (events don‚Äôt wait)
- Good communication & coordination skills
- Honest, organized, and responsible mindset

Optional (Adds Extra Value)
- Experience in event management / advertising agency
- Knowledge of petty cash & on-site cash handling
- Understanding of budget control & P/L reporting

No need to overpromise. You want someone who can control money when chaos is happening on-ground. That‚Äôs the real game.

location: Uttara, Anywhere in Dhaka Division, Banasree, Banani, Mohammadpur
job_description:
Responsibilities: Assist in the overall department management and achieve sales targets through regular monitoring, improved customer service, and team motivation. Main Responsibilities Daily Responsibilities Motivate the department team to achieve sales targets. Ensure proper product display, merchandising, and shelf management. Monitor store inventory, product requisition, and customer service, and provide feedback to the store in-charge. Participate in store meetings, identify areas for improvement, and plan for sales and operational quality enhancement. Weekly Responsibilities Plan and implement merchandising, product display, and customer service flow to increase sales. Provide weekly feedback to the area manager following store management guidelines. Coordinate with the store in-charge to ensure product availability according to the designated time. Maintain shelf maintenance according to the display plan and ensure improved customer service. Monthly Responsibilities Participate in HR training programs and encourage team participation. Ensure compliance with company SOP and stock/inventory management policies. Assist management in staff replacement/recruitment as needed. Maintain cleanliness, security, and healthy environment in the store. Assist in stock verification, variance analysis, and expense control. Initiate team development and performance improvement. Annual Responsibilities Follow the Annual Business Plan (ABP) as directed by the area in-charge/manager. Ensure achievement of sales KPI and HR KPI as per company objectives.

Requirements: Minimum Qualifications and Skills Educational Qualification: Minimum SSC Skills: Good verbal communication skills Customer service attitude Proactive and hardworking mentality Experience: No prior experience required (training will be provided) General Responsibilities and Terms Must follow company objectives, policies, and SOPs. May need to take on additional responsibilities and collaborate with other departments when necessary. Must be adaptable to changes in any unit/branch as per management decisions. Must maintain professional conduct and uphold the company's image at all times. Permanent employees must provide a 60-day notice before resigning. Behavioral Expectations Maintain a professional image and attitude in line with the company's values. Show respect to colleagues and customers. Uphold the company's reputation both inside and outside working hours. Duty and Benefits Working Hours: 9 hours (1 day off per week) Festival bonus Sales incentives Confirmation benefit after 6 months Annual increment and promotion opportunities Monthly team dinner In-house training facilities

* Achieve designated monthly and annual sales targets

Responsibilities: HealthOS is looking for a dependable and organized Junior Admin Officer to support the organization‚Äôs daily administrative activities. This role is designed for individuals who can assist in core admin functions including documentation, vendor coordination, asset tracking, and event logistics ‚Äî all under the supervision of the Admin Officer. The Junior Admin Officer is expected to follow instructions precisely, work with integrity, and ensure smooth administrative execution across both office and operational touchpoints.

Key Responsibilities

- Supplies & Stationery Support:
Assist in tracking office supplies and initiating restocking requests when needed.

- Asset Documentation:
Maintain records of company equipment and infrastructure, ensuring updates are accurate and timely.

- Bill & Utility Tracking:
Monitor rent, electricity, internet, and other utility bills to ensure timely processing and documentation.

- Compliance Document Preparation:
Help gather and prepare necessary paperwork for legal and operational licenses (e.g., trade license, fire safety).

- Vendor Communication:
Liaise with cleaning, maintenance, and service vendors, ensuring work is completed as instructed by the Admin Officer.

- Event Support:
Provide logistical assistance in organizing internal meetings, training sessions, and team events.

- Filing & Records Management:
Maintain organized digital and physical files for all bills, contracts, and administrative documents.

- Data Entry & Report Assistance:
Input data into administrative spreadsheets and assist in compiling reports using Google Docs/Sheets.

Career Path
This is an entry-level administrative position offering valuable hands-on experience in organizational operations, with the potential to grow into a mid-level role based on performance and dedication.

Operational Context
At HealthOS, the Junior Admin Officer plays a supportive administrative role under the direct supervision of the Admin Officer. This position is ideal for individuals early in their administrative career, and includes both desk-based tasks and occasional field responsibilities. The Junior Admin Officer helps manage documentation, vendor follow-up, asset tracking, and event logistics. Precision, honesty, and reliability are critical to success in this role.

Responsibilities: LAMB is a well-run major mission Hospital, Community Health Development, Training and Research organization. Services cover more than 6.3 million people in North West Bangladesh.

There is a vacancy for the following regular position based at LAMB Hospital, Parbatipur, Dinajpur. The Internal Auditor is responsible for planning, executing, and reporting on operational, financial regulatory, and compliance-related audits of LAMB departments and projects, including government compliance, under the direction of the Finance Director (or Executive Director in his/her absence). Review and examine data, looking for patterns and identifying shortages and loss. Report in English, findings, conclusions, and/or recommendations for improvements of processes and procedures (based on policy and best practice) to management of department and projects. Improve LAMB operations through recommendations for bringing systematic and disciplined approaches to the effectiveness of risk management and control processes. Provide support whenever needed or as required by the Finance Director and the Executive Director.

Requirements: Essential Requirements:
Master‚Äôs degree in Finance or Accounting. CACC registered auditor will be given preference. At least 3 to 5 years working experience in internal auditing or over 10 years‚Äô experience with multiple donors or projects. Good understanding and training on various kinds of Government laws/regulations such as VAT and Tax, income tax, etc. Ability to scrutinize large amounts of data and to compile detailed reports. High attention to detail and excellent analytical skills. Preference will be given with external auditing experience in a creditable audit firm in Bangladesh. A valid motorcycle driving license is required. Willingness to travel and stay overnight in field centers as required.

Age: Maximum 45 Years.

Salary: Minimum Tk. 30,000 per month Gross or equivalent to approximately Tk. 4,18,484 per annum, inclusive of all benefits. The remuneration package includes a provident fund, festival allowance once per year, medical benefits, critical illness and death benefits, and recreation.

Job Location: Parbatipur, Dinajpur.

Responsibilities: LAMB is a well-run major mission Hospital, Community Health Development, Training and Research organization. Services cover more than 6.3 million people in North West Bangladesh.

There is a vacancy for the following contractual position based at LAMB Hospital at LAMB Hospital under the Human Resources Department, Parbatipur, Dinajpur. The Head of Human Resources is responsible for the strategic leadership, management, and administration of the Human Resources (HR) function. This includes employee relations, recruitment and staffing, organizational design, succession planning, performance management, compensation and benefits, employee recognition, HR policy development, and learning and development. The position also supports the Executive Director in fostering an organization-wide culture of inclusion, cooperation, staff development, and adherence to principles of non-discrimination, justice, and accountability. Provides guidance and support to all levels of management and staff on HR-related policies, employee relations issues, and procedures. Serves as a member of the Management Team and as a liaison to the Personnel Committee.

Requirements: Essential Requirements:
Masters/MBA preferably in Human Resource Management/Business Studies or any other relevant field from any recognized university/institution. Post Graduated Certification in Human Resources required. At least 10 years of progressively responsible experience in Human Resources leadership. Demonstrated ability to lead the fair and consistent implementation of Human Resources policies and procedures. Proven track record in driving change and leading transformational HR initiatives. Experience in the not-for-profit sector is considered an asset. Strong communication and leadership abilities, along with effective rapport-building skills, are essential for this role. Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills are required.

Salary: Tk.72,500 per month gross. Other benefits include Medical Benefit, Provident Fund, and a festival allowance (100% of basic salary) once per year and critical illness & death benefit.

Job Location: Parbatipur, Dinajpur.

Qualified candidates are requested to apply with a cover letter along with an updated CV (mentioning two references name), all educational & experience certificates, NID and recent passport size photograph to the HR Department, LAMB, P.O. Parbatipur, Dinajpur-5250, Bangladesh; alternatively, email to hrjobs@lambproject.org; Please mention the position name on top of the envelope or with the subject line of the email.

Application Deadline: 17 March 2026.

"Potential woman candidates are strongly encouraged to apply"

- Opportunity for rapid career advancement through hard work and skills development
- Financial Associate -> Unit Manager -> Branch Manager

Financial Benefits:
1. Quick start to earning after joining

3. Average annual income of 20 lakh taka for top 100 performers, along with other bonuses

1. International and domestic travel
2. Recognition at international conferences
3. Medical coverage for family
4. Provident fund
5. Scholarship for children's education

Chances for Rapid Success:
1. World-class training facilities
2. Skilled trainers
3. Digital workspace
4. 100% online-based programs for sales and activity management
5. Digital tools for sales and activity management

Opportunities for Personal Business:
1. Opportunity to start your own business without investment
2. Rapid promotion based on performance, with opportunities to become Unit Manager and later Branch Manager
3. Opportunity to start an agency in your own name
4. Work flexibility based on personal convenience

Responsibilities:
- Assist millions of people in providing health and financial protection
- Establish and monitor relationships with clients to achieve business goals

Job Flexibility:
- Part-time and full-time job opportunities

Metlife Munir Hossain Agency
Metlife, Bangladesh

Responsibilities: Job profile

The SOC Analyst (L1) is responsible for continuous monitoring, first-level triage, and initial response actions based on approved SOC playbooks. The role focuses on accurate classification of alerts, rapid escalation of true security events, and maintaining high-quality case records to support investigations.

Responsibilities

- Monitor SIEM and security tooling queues; review alerts, events, and anomalies across endpoints, identity, email, and network sources.
- Perform initial triage: validate alert context, enrich with basic data (user, host, IP, geolocation, asset criticality), and determine severity.
- Create and maintain incident tickets with complete evidence, timeline, and actions taken; ensure accurate categorization and tagging.
- Execute approved first-response playbooks (e.g., phishing triage, user verification steps, initial containment requests, password reset escalation).
- Escalate suspected incidents to L2 within defined SLAs; ensure smooth handover with clear notes and supporting artifacts.
- Support SOC reporting by maintaining disciplined ticket hygiene and shift handover notes.
- Continuously improve alert quality by flagging false positives, missing telemetry, or recurring issues to the SOC Lead/SIEM Engineer.

Core competencies

- Meticulous attention to detail and strong documentation discipline.
- Ability to work shifts and remain effective under pressure.
- Curiosity and structured thinking‚Äîable to follow playbooks while spotting anomalies.
- Strong communication and teamwork skills.

Job Nature / Shift:

This role may be shift-based to support SOC coverage requirements (including weekends and public holidays as per shift rota). Shift patterns will be structured (e.g., 8-hour shifts) with rest days managed through the rota.

Reporting line

The SOC Analyst shall report to SOC Lead / Incident Response Lead (as applicable)

Compensation & Benefits:

- Competitive and attractive salary package will be offered to deserving candidates based on experience and skill set.
- Festival Bonus
- Provident Fund & Gratuity
- Life & Health Insurance (IPD & OPD)
- Annual Health Check-up
- Baisakhi Allowance
- Vehicle Loan Scheme / Vehicle Maintenance Allowance

Requirements: Education and Experience:
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Cyber Security/IT/Information Security or similar.
- 1‚Äì3 years‚Äô experience in SOC operations, IT security, NOC with security monitoring exposure, or related discipline.
- Good written and spoken English; able to produce clear tickets and shift handovers.
- Comfortable operating in a multi-country environment and supporting distributed teams.

Required knowledge and Technical Skills:
- Basic understanding of cybersecurity concepts: malware, phishing, brute force, lateral movement, data exfiltration, and common attack patterns.

job_title: Sr. SOC Analyst ‚Äì Investigation & Incident Handling
job_description:
Responsibilities: Job profile
The Sr. SOC Analyst conducts in-depth investigations of escalated alerts and suspected incidents, confirms scope and impact, coordinates containment actions with IT and business stakeholders, and drives incidents to closure with appropriate evidence and reporting.

Responsibilities
- Investigate escalated alerts using SIEM/EDR/email/identity/network telemetry to confirm incident validity, scope, and root cause hypotheses.
- Perform correlation across multiple data sources and build incident timelines; identify affected users, systems, and data at risk.
- Coordinate containment and remediation with local IT teams (endpoint isolation, account disable/reset, blocking IOCs, firewall/VPN actions) per approved procedures.
- Lead incident communications for assigned cases: maintain stakeholder updates, ensure actions are tracked, and escalate to Lead Information Security when thresholds are met.
- Collect and preserve evidence in line with internal standards (logs, screenshots, hashes, email headers, EDR artifacts) to support audit/regulatory reporting.
- Support development and refinement of playbooks/runbooks and detection logic by providing feedback to SIEM Engineer and Lead Information Security.
- Conduct post-incident reviews for assigned incidents and propose preventive controls and monitoring improvements.

Core competencies
- Strong analytical and investigative mindset; able to distinguish signal from noise.
- Structured incident handling and stakeholder coordination.
- High-quality documentation and reporting, including executive-ready summaries when required.
- Mentorship: supports L1 analysts through guidance and coaching.

Reporting line
The Sr. SOC Analyst shall report to Lead Information Security (as applicable)

Compensation & Benefits:
- Competitive and attractive salary package will be offered to deserving candidates based on experience and skill set.
- Festival Bonus
- Provident Fund & Gratuity
- Life & Health Insurance (IPD & OPD)
- Annual Health Check-up
- Baisakhi Allowance
- Vehicle Loan Scheme / Vehicle Maintenance Allowance

Requirements: Education and Experience:
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in CSE/IT/Information Security or similar.
- 3‚Äì6 years‚Äô experience in SOC/incident response/security operations; financial services experience preferred.
- Experience with SIEM and Microsoft/Azure security solutions is preferred.

Certifications (preferred):
- Incident handling/SOC: GCIH, GCIA, CEH, Security+, or equivalent.
- Vendor certifications (Microsoft security, Wazuh) are an advantage.

Required knowledge and Technical Skills:
- Hands-on investigation skills across SIEM, EDR, email security, and identity logs.
- Good understanding of Windows security events, common attacker techniques, and incident scoping methods.
- Ability to run basic threat hunting queries and pivot between telemetry sources.
- Understanding of financial services threat scenarios (phishing/BEC, credential theft, privileged access abuse, ranso

company_address: Dhaka office : House -30 , Road 02, Banani, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Organization Name: Prayojon Jonoseba Limited Approval: Approved by the Government of the People's Republic of Bangladesh As part of the program aimed at creating a hunger-free, poverty-free, and unemployment-free Bangladesh, personnel will be recruited for the position of Territory Sales Manager (TSM) in every union under all police stations in Naogaon district. The organization is currently implementing a supply program at 50% reduced prices for monthly markets (rice, lentils, oil, soap, flour, sugar, salt) until the next 5 (five) years. Responsible and hardworking individuals are invited to manage and monitor this program effectively. Job Description Position: Territory Sales Manager (TSM) Location: Candidate's own union (Naogaon district) Educational Qualification: Minimum SSC/HSC Candidate Qualifications and Attributes Must be honest, responsible, and hardworking Should be enthusiastic about community service Must have good communication skills Should have a mindset to work at the grassroots level Salary and Benefits Monthly salary: 25,000 - 30,000 Taka Incentives and target bonuses Promotion opportunities Application Process Interested candidates are requested to contact promptly. job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for a skilled and energetic 3D Designer as the digital world continues to expand, the role of a 3D Designer has become more essential than ever. Whether it's for video games, films, architectural visualization, or virtual reality, 3D Designers bring concepts to life with stunning visual effects and intricate details. This page lists the job description for a 3D Designer/GRAPHIC DESIGNER/DRAFTSMAN. Read on to understand the responsibilities, qualifications, and skills needed for this dynamic and creative role.

We are seeking a 3D designer to create high-quality three-dimensional Render images, models, and animations for our company. You will collaborate in brainstorming sessions with a team of illustrators, designers, and engineers to develop initial sketches, wireframes, and prototypes of images and product representations. You will edit existing 3D models and create new ones. The right candidate will have an exceptional understanding of 3DS MAX, ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR and CAD software, stay up to date with the best techniques and solutions for design, and remain compliant with company design standards.

Below are some of the responsibilities of a 3D designer:
- Collaborate with graphic designers, illustrators, architects, engineers, etc. to create storyboards
- Create 3D images, Creating graphic Art, and interactive objects using CAD software
- Conceptualize and build virtual reality environments
- Communicate directly with clients, team members, and stakeholders regarding project targets, progress, and final products.

Requirements: We are looking for a 3D designer to produce high-quality three-dimensional render images, models, and animations for our company. You will participate in brainstorming sessions with a team of illustrators, designers, and engineers to create initial sketches, wireframes, and prototypes of images and product representations. You will modify existing 3D models and generate new ones. The ideal candidate will possess a strong grasp of 3DS MAX, ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR, and CAD software, keep abreast of the latest design techniques and solutions, and adhere to company design standards.

job_description:
Responsibilities: At the heart of Ashulia, a renowned institution, Swadesh Hospital, will be hiring experienced marketing officers. Interested candidates from the Ashulia area are encouraged to apply promptly.

- All services of the hospital (doctors, diagnostics, surgery, etc.) will be promoted and branded.
- Building and maintaining relationships with various clinics, diagnostic centers, pharmacies, and healthcare professionals.
- Negotiating contracts/agreements with corporate clients, insurance companies, and organizations.
- Creating a network of patient referrals through field visits.
- Organizing camps, free medical check-ups, and health awareness programs.
- Coordinating advertising on social media and online platforms.
- Achieving monthly targets and reporting.

Salary and Benefits:
- Competitive salary + incentive based on targets.
- Mobile bill and TA/DA.
- Provident fund/bonus (as per company policy).

Job Location: Baipail, Ashulia (Dhaka)

Requirements: Minimum Bachelor's degree (Educational qualification may be relaxed for experienced candidates). Minimum 3 (three) years of experience in Hospital/Diagnostic/Pharma sector required. Good communication skills and negotiation skills are essential. Must have the mindset to work in field marketing.

Responsibilities: ```html * Summary of the Position * The Store Assistant will be responsible for receiving, storing, handling, and issuing company store/warehouse products correctly. They will maintain inventory, check stock, and assist in daily store operations. * Main Responsibilities * Receive incoming goods at the store and verify quantities Arrange and store products in the store correctly and ensure proper storage Issue goods to various departments as needed and maintain records Enter data into inventory management software (if available) Prepare daily/weekly/monthly stock reports Inform the Store Incharge about stock shortages or excess products Maintain a clean and safe store environment Follow FIFO/LIFO or company inventory policies Assist in regular stock audits ```

Requirements: ```html * Essential Qualifications * Minimum HSC/Diploma (modifiable as per requirement) Preference given to candidates with 1-2 years of experience in inventory/store management Basic computer skills (MS Excel, Inventory Software, etc.) Proficiency in accounting and cash handling with attention to detail Physically fit and capable of handling goods * Skills * Time management Ability to work collaboratively in a team Honest, responsible, and hardworking Good communication skills ```

job_description:
Responsibilities: Necessity Service Limited (An institution approved by the Government of the People's Republic of Bangladesh) As part of the program aimed at eradicating hunger, poverty, and unemployment in Bangladesh, Necessity Service Limited is recruiting personnel in various districts of Khulna Division. Qualified and enthusiastic candidates are invited to apply for the ongoing operational and monitoring activities of the institution. Under the special program of the institution, customers will have the opportunity to purchase essential commodities (rice, lentils, oil, soap, flour, sugar, salt) at a 50% discounted price for the next 5 (five) years through regular monthly market purchases for 10 (ten) months. This program aims to effectively implement the initiative by providing employment opportunities to the workforce. Position: Area Sales Manager (ASM) Location: Each district of Khulna Division's respective police stations Job Type: Full-time Educational Qualifications Minimum HSC/ Honors or equivalent Preference will be given to candidates with experience in sales and management-related work Responsibilities Conducting and monitoring activities in the designated area Team coordination and monitoring Ensuring customer service and program implementation Achieving set targets Salary and Benefits Monthly salary: 40,000 - 50,000 BDT Incentives and target bonuses Promotion opportunities Opportunity to work in your own area Application Process To learn more or to apply, please call or SMS: üìû 01952000042 (Office Admin) Corporate Office Address Dhaka Office: House-30, Road-02, Banani, Dhaka Necessity Service Limited Your service, by your side.

Incentive system in place.

Responsibilities: Best All-Baby Mart is a rapidly growing multi-faceted business establishment (operating online baby food, children's products, and other goods). The organization is looking to hire an experienced and leadership-oriented Operations Manager to oversee the overall operations with expertise in management, team management, and operational development. Main Responsibilities: Supervision of all office staff's work efficiency, task distribution, and performance monitoring Ensuring proper control and record-keeping of attendance, leaves, and office hours Monitoring the complete process from order taking to delivery Ensuring proper order processing, invoice generation, and packaging Regular communication with courier partners and follow-up on delivery status Managing returns and customer complaints ensuring swift resolution Stock management, inventory control, and reconciliation Planning purchases and coordinating with suppliers Preparing daily, weekly, and monthly sales and operation reports in Excel Expense analysis, budget monitoring, and operational cost reduction planning Team training and performance evaluation Developing and implementing new processes/Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) Planning sales trends and business development through data analysis Presenting reports to the owner/management daily Educational Qualifications: Minimum Bachelor's degree (Honors/BBA/MBA in Management, Marketing, Finance, or related field) Additional training or courses in Operations Management/Supply Chain Management will be advantageous Experience and Skills: At least 1-3 years of experience in supervision or operations management (e-commerce experience is a plus) Proficiency in MS Excel (VLOOKUP, HLOOKUP, IF, Pivot Table, Data Analysis, etc.) Skills in team management and problem-solving Ability to make quick decisions and work under pressure Honest, hardworking, and responsible attitude Salary and Benefits: Monthly salary: 18,000 - 25,000 BDT (based on experience) Performance-based bonus 3-month probation period Potential for future promotion Duty Hours: 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM Workplace: Dhaka - Demra, Staff Quarter, Baro Bhanga Application Process: Interested candidates can email their CV to: (mention email address) Write in the subject line: Operation Manager Application Contact: (mention mobile number)

job_description:
Responsibilities: Before applying, make sure to read the complete post,

Our main goal at HealthOS company is to deliver our products to our esteemed customers with great care.

Job Description,

1. Understand the products correctly according to the correct invoice from the supervisor
2. After understanding the product correctly, arrange the product in the designated place
3. After the product is ordered, package the correct product by checking the invoice

Work Hours:
Morning Shift: 11 pm to 7 am.

Responsibilities: Key Accounts Executive will be responsible for generating B2B sales for IT solutions (software, SaaS, system integration) and HR services (recruitment, staffing, payroll, RPO). The role focuses on acquiring new corporate clients, maintaining strong relationships, and driving revenue growth.

Identify and approach potential corporate clients for IT and HR service solutions.

Generate qualified B2B leads through cold calling, networking, LinkedIn, and referrals.

Conduct client meetings, needs analysis, and solution presentations.

Prepare proposals, service agreements, and pricing quotations.

Negotiate contracts and close deals.

Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets.

Develop long-term partnerships with HR heads, IT managers, and decision-makers.

Coordinate with technical and HR operations teams to ensure smooth service delivery.

Maintain CRM database and prepare regular sales reports.

Job Location: Gazipur

Requirements: - Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
- 2-5 years of experience in B2B sales (IT solutions or HR services preferred)
- Strong understanding of corporate sales cycle and consultative selling
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills
- Ability to present technical or service-based solutions confidently
- Proficiency in MS Office and CRM software

Skills we need:
- Knowledge of SaaS products, recruitment process outsourcing (RPO), or staffing solutions
- Strong lead generation and closing ability
- Relationship-building with corporate decision-makers
- Target-driven and self-motivated mindset

company_address: NOVO TOWER, LEVEL 9 270, Tejgaon I/A, Dhaka-1208, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: Assist category managers in selecting products, planning stock, and managing day-to-day operations to ensure smooth execution and sales growth. Regularly visit markets to monitor consumer trends, competitor pricing, and identify new product opportunities with a market-aware approach. Work with suppliers to procure products, negotiate promotional terms, and ensure timely availability for campaigns and peak demand. Monitor sales and inventory levels for assigned accounts, prepare concise weekly performance reports to guide decision-making. Identify and approach new corporate clients for bulk orders, create customized proposals and accurate quotations to secure business. Maintain organized records of clients and suppliers, track order progress, and proactively follow up to ensure timely delivery and satisfaction. Negotiate terms and address client concerns with a customer-centric approach to foster strong, long-term relationships. Collaborate with internal teams to implement merchandising and promotional initiatives that boost product visibility and drive results.

Requirements: - Minimum Bachelor's degree (any discipline).
- Basic computer skills (MS Excel, Word).
- Strong communication and negotiation ability.
- Ability to travel locally and work in markets.
- Honest, proactive, and eager to learn.
- Preference for candidates from the same locality or surrounding area.

We offer a collaborative work culture, professional growth opportunities, and performance-linked benefits for the right candidate.
Other Benefits: Two Festival Bonus, Mobile Allowance, Subsidized Lunch, LFA, Gratuity, and PF.

Assist category managers with product selection, stock planning, and day‚Äëto‚Äëday operations to support smooth execution and sales growth. Visit markets regularly to track consumer trends, competitor pricing, and emerging product opportunities with an attentive, market‚Äëaware approach. Coordinate with suppliers to source products, negotiate promotional terms, and ensure timely availability for campaigns and peak demand. Monitor sales and inventory levels across assigned accounts, compiling concise weekly performance reports to inform decisions. Identify and pursue new corporate clients for bulk orders, preparing tailored proposals and accurate quotations to win business. Maintain organized client and supplier records, track order progress, and proactively follow up to ensure timely delivery and satisfaction. Negotiate terms and resolve client concerns with a customer‚Äëfocused attitude to build strong, long‚Äëterm relationships. Collaborate with internal teams to implement merchandising and promotional initiatives that enhance product visibility and drive results.

Responsibilities: Receiving inbound calls from customers and making outbound calls when necessary Maintaining respectful, professional, and effective communication with customers Presenting products, services, or necessary information clearly to customers Skillfully resolving customer questions, requests, and complaints Accurately maintaining and updating records related to customer information and calls Following designated scripts and company guidelines while working

job_description:
Responsibilities: In SINOPEC Engineering Group Co. in Saudi Arabia, recruitment is ongoing for the position of Construction Labor! Job Responsibilities: Performing various tasks of general labor on the construction site Transporting materials to and from the work site and ensuring they reach the correct location Performing tasks such as digging, cutting, leveling, cleaning, etc. as per the supervisor's instructions Safely using necessary hand tools and power tools Working in compliance with site safety regulations and using PPE Assisting in concrete work, scaffolding setup/dismantling Maintaining site cleanliness and hygiene Benefits: Salary: 1263 Riyal + Food + Accommodation + Overtime Working Hours: 10 hours daily Accommodation: Provided by the company; Food: Self Overtime: As per Saudi labor law Other Benefits: Insurance, transportation, and medical facilities provided by the company üìå Qualifications: (Please read the details carefully before applying for the job) Age: 21-35 years. Minimum height should be 165 cm and minimum weight should be 60 kg. Educational Qualifications: Minimum pass in 8th grade Physically fit and hardworking Preference given to those with experience working on construction sites Ability to understand instructions and work quickly Passport: All candidates must bring both new and old passports for the interview. The passport must be valid for at least 2 years. Those without a passport should not apply. Interview Method: Not an online interview. Candidates must be present in person for the interview. Previous Experience: Those who are blacklisted in KSA (Saudi Arabia) will not be eligible to interview for this recruitment. üìÜ Delegate Interview: 3rd and 4th March, 2026 (Dhaka) Additional Information: Visa Contract Period: 2 (two) years - non-renewable Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining the visa

company_address: Sophia Villa, House 38, 3rd Floor (Lift-3), Garib-E-Newaz Ave., Sector 11, Uttara, Dhaka.
job_description:
Responsibilities: EuroZone Education, a leading student consultancy firm, is hiring Study Abroad Consultants to join our dynamic team in Uttara. This role is ideal for individuals passionate about education, international opportunities, and client engagement. You will be responsible for guiding students through the entire study abroad process ‚Äî from university selection and application submission to visa documentation and pre-departure support.

- Counsel and advise students and guardians on overseas education opportunities in various countries (Finland, Denmark, Belgium, Lithuania, Sweden, Italy, Estonia, Latvia, etc.)
- Assist students with application processes including documentation, university selection, and SOP/LOI guidance
- Maintain up-to-date knowledge of admission requirements, scholarship options, and visa onboarding procedures
- Communicate with partner universities and ensure accurate and timely submissions
- Follow up regularly with leads and ensure conversion through personalized guidance
- Coordinate with internal departments to deliver a seamless client experience
- Meet individual and team targets aligned with company goals

job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for a creative and results-driven Marketing Expert & Graphic Designer to join our team remotely. The ideal candidate should have strong skills in digital marketing strategies and graphic design to help grow our brand presence, manage campaigns, and create engaging visual content.

- Experience with social media marketing and paid ads
- Creative mindset with attention to detail
- Good communication skills in English
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Video editing skills (optional but a plus)
- SEO and content marketing knowledge
- Experience with marketing analytics tools
