job_description:
Responsibilities: üì¢ Job Opportunity at BuzzBlu Team!
üßæ Position: Accounts Assistant
üìç Location: Shanir Akhara, Dhaka
üí∞ Salary: 12,000-18,000 BDT (Based on skills and experience)

‚úÖ Job Responsibilities:
1. Maintain daily sales and expense accounts - track daily sales, payment collection, refunds, and petty cash.
2. Update accounts on Google Sheet/Excel - digitally record and organize all transactions.
3. Prepare investment and finance reports monthly - analyze profit-loss, customer transactions, and expenses.
4. Calculate staff salaries, incentives, and attendance - prepare salaries and incentives based on office hours, attendance, and targets.
5. Review bank and merchant transactions - check and reconcile bKash/cash/bank payments and receipts.
6. Maintain separate and organized accounts for each wing - keep records in designated files or sheets, maintain monthly folders, and document any changes with names and dates.

Additional Responsibilities:
- Record and track daily financial transactions.
- Prepare and verify invoices and receipts.
- Prepare bank reconciliation and cash flow reports.
- Create monthly worksheets and verify financial data.
- Prepare reports on expenses and income.
- Monitor accounts payable and receivable.
- Prepare stock and inventory reports.
- Assist in tax-related activities.
- Perform other tasks in the accounts department such as filing and documentation.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Accounting or equivalent, or HSC or equivalent.
- Familiarity with accounting systems and computer skills.
- Ability to enter data quickly and accurately.
- Strong communication skills and ability to work in a team.
- Good understanding of accounting software and Microsoft Excel.

Experience:
- 1-2 years of relevant experience in the field.
- Knowledge of banking or financial reporting is a plus.

Offer:
- Attractive salary and benefits.
- Opportunities for professional development.

Requirements:
- At least 1 year of experience in accounting.
- Proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets.
- Attention to detail and accuracy in accounting.
- Consciousness of confidentiality and responsibility.
- Time management and team-oriented skills.
- Priority given to experienced hijabi/religious female candidates.

Benefits:
- Separate prayer facilities and prayer bonus at the office.
- 4 days of flexible leave per month.
- Timely salary, performance bonus, and attendance incentives.
- Opportunities for promotion and skill development.
- Self-improvement bonus for reading and reviewing a book monthly.

If you are passionate about accurate accounting, timeliness, and responsibility, then this position is for you.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Immediate Vacancy with Basic salary and Attractive Commission
The post holder will provide program consultation to prospective students and/or their parents on all courses offered by Overseas Universities & Colleges. This position holder will participate in various marketing activities to promote the programs.

Responsibilities:
- Sales & marketing activities to promote programs.
- Make outbound sales calls to customers to promote products.
- Responsible to attend potential customers through WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, and Telegram.
- Work as a team to achieve individual and group targets.
- Contribute creative ideas for sales and marketing plans.

Office Time: 10 AM to 07 PM

Benefits:
- Salary: 12000 to 15000 tk
- Salary is negotiable for candidates having more than 3 years of experience in the relevant field.
- High Commission will be provided for each confirming candidate.

[Candidates from Malibagh, Mouchak, Santinogor, Gulbag & Rampura will get preference]

Requirements: - Candidate should possess at least a recognized Bachelor's degree or equivalent academic qualification in marketing or any other relevant field of study.
- A positive team player with strong communication skills, excellent in customer service, and result-oriented.
- While valuing teamwork, the candidate must be independent with a high degree of maturity, responsibility, and initiative.
- Ability to provide education. Strong interpersonal and communication skills, along with the ability to communicate comfortably with students courteously and professionally.
- Skilled in identifying problems and brainstorming potential solutions.
- Must have a good command of English.
- Must be smart, confident, and soft-spoken.
- Must be target-oriented.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Earn up to 20,000 taka by joining Foodpanda as a rider Joining bonus up to 1,500 taka for new riders in Dhaka* Motorbike: 1,500 taka Cycle: 1,500 taka On foot: 1,500 taka Attractive benefits you will receive: Weekly quest bonus, surge fee bonus, new rider bonus, and extra earning opportunities. Also, enjoy attractive rider tips and referral program for friends. Flexible working hours, location, and weekly payment. Set your own working hours in your preferred zone and receive your earned money at the end of the week (every Monday). Loyalty points and deals: Earn points on every delivery (1 point = 1 order) and enjoy discount deals using each point with partners. Responsibilities: The Digital Sales team relies heavily on field-level freelancers for lead generation. To ensure the Acquisition team has a steady and sufficient lead pipeline for both Shops and Restaurants, we need your support for freelancer hiring for lead generation.

What are our current offerings for the freelancers?

To encourage active participation, we are providing rewards for each qualified lead:

- BDT 75 per qualified Restaurant lead
- BDT 60 per qualified Shop lead
- Payment disbursement: Processed by HR and released by the end of the next month

Qualifying Criteria:

- Leads must be new and not available in Salesforce.
- SKU Limit: 11 items
- All leads must be submitted through the Google Form.
- Leads must fall within existing delivery zones. Freelancers can verify coverage by checking the Bangladesh Delivery Map.

Support & Training:

The Digital Sales team is willing to conduct short training sessions for freelancers on how to identify potential leads and how to submit them properly.

Responsibilities: Provide safe Pick & Drop service to employees according to the designated route and schedule. Operate Manual Hiace vehicles with skill and caution. Complete daily checklist of the vehicle (brakes, lights, tires, fuel, engine oil, etc.). Maintain cleanliness and regular servicing of the vehicle. Maintain records related to fuel usage and mileage. Maintain respectful, professional, and responsible behavior with passengers.

Requirements: Valid driving license (professional license preferred). Must have at least 3 (three) years of practical experience in driving manual vehicles. Special experience in driving Hiace or similar microbuses preferred. Should have a good understanding of road safety and traffic laws. Must have integrity, punctuality, and a responsible mindset. Should have a mindset to work overtime or extra hours as needed.

Responsibilities: ‚ú≥Ô∏è Job Summary
The General Manager will be responsible for the overall management, operational control, compliance, financial oversight, and business growth of the company‚Äôs three mobile retail shops dealing with imported mobile phone sets. The role requires strong leadership, integrity, discipline, and experience in administration and governance.

üõÑ Key Roles & Responsibilities
‚úÖ Business Growth & Planning
- Develop detailed strategies, action plans, and timelines to increase the company‚Äôs products and services and expand business operations.
- Identify opportunities for business improvement, operational efficiency, and sustainable growth.

‚úÖ Operations & Team Management
- Oversee daily operations of all three mobile shops and ensure smooth workflow.
- Lead, manage, and supervise shop managers and staff, ensuring discipline, coordination, and performance improvement.
- Conduct regular shop visits and performance evaluations.

‚úÖ Customer Care & Service Excellence
- Ensure high-quality customer care services across all outlets.
- Maintain strong relationships with customers and resolve major complaints or disputes professionally.

‚úÖ Inventory & Asset Control
- Monitor inward and outward movement of mobile phones and accessories.
- Ensure proper documentation, IMEI records, stock registers, and prevention of stock loss or misuse.
- Verify inventory reports and ensure transparency in stock management.

‚úÖ Financial Oversight & Confidentiality
- Oversee all financial transactions of the company, including sales, expenses, cash handling, and bank deposits.
- Supervise loan disbursement and recovery (if applicable) in accordance with company policies.
- Maintain strict confidentiality of all financial transactions, records, and sensitive company information.

‚úÖ Compliance & Governance
- Ensure compliance with government regulations, customs documentation, VAT, tax, and company policies.
- Maintain proper records to support audits, inspections, and regulatory requirements.

‚úÖ Staff & Customer Welfare
- Ensure customers and office staff receive all benefits, facilities, and entitlements as per company rules and policies.
- Promote ethical practices, fairness, and professionalism within the organization.

‚úÖ Reporting & Coordination
- Prepare and submit regular operational and financial reports to ownership/management.
- Coordinate closely with accounts, operations, suppliers, and other stakeholders.
- Report risks, irregularities, or operational issues promptly with recommendations for corrective action.

Preferred Candidate Profile
Age: 25-65 years
Background: Retired Army / Defense / Banker / College or University Teacher / Government Service
Strong leadership, integrity, administrative experience, and decision-making ability

Requirements: ‚úÖ Required Documents Updated CV / Resume Recent passport-size photograph Photocopies of educational certificates Photocopy of National ID (NID) ‚úÖ Required Qualifications & Skills Masters or equivalen

Responsibilities: Responsibility:
1. Collect orders from customers in the market.
2. Communicate with customers to provide product information and prices.
3. Record orders after confirmation and report to the office.
4. Provide delivery and payment information related to products to the office appropriately.

Responsibilities: Responsibilities of a CCTV Technician:

Setting up CCTV systems, including cameras, wiring, and recording devices, as well as configuring software and network connections.

Regularly inspecting and testing CCTV equipment to ensure optimal performance and identifying potential issues before they escalate.

Diagnosing and repairing faults in CCTV systems, including camera malfunctions, wiring problems, and software errors.

Project Maintenance Works.

- Troubleshooting & Repair: Diagnose, repair, or replace broken components (cameras, cabling, power supplies, NVRs/DVRs).
- Documentation: Maintain accurate service logs, system configurations, and maintenance reports.

Interacting with clients to address their concerns, provide support, and explain the operation of the system.

Provide technical support to users, troubleshoot issues, and ensure the smooth and secure operation of IT infrastructure. IT Technicians are essential for maintaining an organization's technological capabilities and productivity. Configuring, monitoring, and maintaining LAN/WAN networks, ensuring network security and connectivity.

- Experience: Proven experience as a CCTV Technician, with 2-3 years preferred.

Ability to work at heights and in various weather conditions. Ability to UTP /Fiber Cable laying.

Responsibilities: We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented Video Editor & Motion Designer to join our team. The selected candidate will be responsible for editing videos, creating motion graphics, and producing engaging visual content for digital platforms, marketing campaigns, and promotional materials.

Job Responsibilities:

- Edit raw footage into compelling, polished videos for social media, websites, and promotional materials
- Follow scripts, outlines, or storyboards to arrange footage in a logical sequence
- Apply transitions, effects, motion graphics, titles, and captions
- Add music, voice-overs, and sound effects for balanced audio
- Perform trimming, cropping, resizing, color grading, stabilization, and rendering
- Ensure all video content follows brand guidelines and quality standards
- Collaborate with marketing and creative teams
- Check videos for errors and technical issues before final delivery
- Stay updated with the latest video editing trends and technologies

Requirements: Additional Requirements

- Age 20 to 35 years
- Proven experience in video editing
- Proficiency in: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci
- Resolve excellent storytelling and visual sense
- Strong organizational and time management skills
- Ability to work independently and in a team
- Creative mindset with a passion for video production
- Marketing-related experience will be an advantage

Responsibilities: Core Responsibilities
- Handle day-to-day accounting (cash, bank, petty cash, journals)
- Prepare event-wise budgets and track actual vs planned cost
- Manage vendor bills, advances, and final settlements
- Issue client invoices and follow up for payments (this is critical)
- Maintain receivables & payables reports

Event-Specific Duties
- Control event-wise expense tracking (fabrication, manpower, logistics, F&B, artists, etc.)
- Verify vendor quotations, PO, and bills before payment
- Ensure on-site cash disbursement is documented properly
- Close accounts event-by-event after execution

Financial Control & Compliance
- Maintain VAT, Tax, TDS records
- Assist in monthly closing & audit support
- Ensure company policies are followed in spending
- Maintain proper bill files & digital records

Coordination & Reporting
- Coordinate with Project Managers & Operations team
- Prepare profit/loss reports per event
- Submit management financial reports
- Support decision-making with cost insights

Tools & Skills Expected
- Strong in Excel / Google Sheets
- Knowledge of Tally / accounting software
- Good understanding of event costing
- Detail-oriented, deadline-driven mindset

Requirements: Requirements
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Accounting / Finance / Business Administration
- 2-4 years experience in accounts
- Strong knowledge of basic accounting principles
- Hands-on experience with Tally / accounting software
- Excellent command over MS Excel / Google Sheets
- Ability to manage event-wise costing & expense tracking
- Knowledge of VAT, Tax & compliance (practical, not textbook)
- Experience handling vendor bills, payments & client invoicing
- Strong attention to detail and accuracy
- Ability to work under tight deadlines & pressure (events don‚Äôt wait)
- Good communication & coordination skills
- Honest, organized, and responsible mindset

Optional (Adds Extra Value)
- Experience in event management / advertising agency
- Knowledge of petty cash & on-site cash handling
- Understanding of budget control & P/L reporting

Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The country consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands - Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. Each year, millions of tourists visit the islands, and the country's economy heavily relies on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular salaries, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Field: Private villa and condominium construction Position: Electrician Number of positions: 8 Responsibilities: Installation of electrical lines on building and construction sites Installation of switches, sockets, DB boards, and light fittings Diagnosis and repair of electrical faults Adherence to safety standards Requirements: Age: 21-40 years Language: Must be able to speak and understand English fluently Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in their respective field; training and experience certificates in the mentioned field must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant field is necessary. Candidates must be mentally calm and adaptable, and must have a clean record. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. job_description:
Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The country consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands - Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. The islands attract millions of tourists each year, and the country's economy relies heavily on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular pay, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Position: Construction of private villas and condominiums Position: Plumber Number of Positions: 7 Job Responsibilities: Installation of water pipes, drainage, and sanitary lines Working on bathroom and kitchen fittings Fixing pipe leaks and blockage issues Repair work on new and old lines Requirements: Age: 21-40 years. Must be able to speak and understand English fluently. Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in the relevant job; training and experience certificates in the field must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant job is necessary. Candidates must be mentally calm and tolerant, and must have a clean record. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. Benefits: Salary: USD 1,000 per month; 6 days a week Accommodation: Free; Transportation: Free Food: Self-funded Work Permit: Provided Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa Comparatively low visa processing costs Contract Duration: 12 months; Renewable based on conditions Deadline for File Submission: First week of March, 2026 Delegate Interview: March, 2026

Responsibilities: ```html Job Summary: The main responsibility of this position will be to communicate with interested students/clients of Skillroom Bangladesh IT regarding online courses and digital services, provide them with accurate information according to their needs, and assist in the enrollment process. It is an Ed-Tech position rich in opportunities for freshers to learn. Duties & Responsibilities: Handle inquiries related to online courses (Facebook, WhatsApp, Call, Messenger, etc.) Clarify and explain courses to students in a clear and easy-to-understand manner Assist in the enrollment process Follow up with clients and maintain the database Work as per the directions given by Team Lead/Senior Ensure online student support Job Type: Remote / Hybrid (Work From Home) Office Hours: Flexible Time (As per own convenience, based on set targets) ```

Responsibilities: China State Middle East, a renowned organization in Saudi Arabia, is hiring skilled and experienced Mason Foreman.

Responsibilities:
- Supervising and dividing work among the mason team.
- Overseeing all masonry work including blocks, plaster, tiles, and brickwork.
- Ensuring work is done correctly according to project drawings.
- Preparing daily progress reports and informing the supervisor/engineer.
- Ensuring site safety rules are followed and providing guidance on risk prevention.

Benefits:
- Salary: 2500 - 4000 Saudi Riyal + food + accommodation + OT
- Accommodation and food provided by the company
- Working hours: 10 hours per day
- Other benefits: Company will provide visa and transportation
- Overtime: As per Saudi labor law

Qualifications: (Please read the details carefully before applying)
========================================
- Educational Qualification: Diploma/B.Sc in Civil Engineering.
- Certification: Preference will be given to candidates with relevant professional certificates or training.
- Experience: 3 to 5 years of work experience. Candidates with GCC/foreign work experience will be preferred.
- Language: Must be able to speak basic English or Arabic.

üìÜ Delegate Interview: March 2026 (Dhaka)

Additional Information:
- Visa contract period: 2 years - renewable
- Passport: All applicants must bring both new and old passports to the interview. Passports must have a minimum validity of 1.5 years. Applicants without passports should not apply.
- Payment terms: Payment will be made after obtaining the visa.

Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The nation consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands - Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. The islands attract millions of tourists each year, and the country's economy heavily relies on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular wages, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Field: Private villa and condominium construction Position: Mason Number of positions: 10 Job Responsibilities: Construction of walls using brick, block, and concrete Cement mixing and work according to the level Structure creation according to the plan Coordinate work with the team on the construction site Requirements: Age: 21-40 years. Language: Must be able to speak and understand English fluently. Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in their respective field; training and experience certificates related to the job must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant field is necessary. Candidates must be mentally calm and tolerant, and must be able to adapt to the local culture. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. Benefits: Salary: USD 1,000 / month; 6 days a week Accommodation: Free; Transportation: Free Food: Self-funded Work Permit: Provided Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa Visa processing costs are comparatively low Contract Duration: 12 months; Renewable based on performance. Deadline for submitting files: First week of March, 2026 Delegate Interview: March, 2026

Responsibilities: A skilled and experienced Civil General Foreman is being recruited for the renowned organization China State Middle East in Saudi Arabia. Responsibilities: Supervising and managing all civil works (earth cutting, concrete, blocks, plaster, formwork, steel fixing). Coordinating the work of various teams on-site and ensuring proper distribution of work. Ensuring that daily work is progressing correctly according to drawings, specifications, and BOQ. Preparing daily reports based on work progress and providing them to engineers/site managers. Ensuring site safety protocols and company policies. Managing equipment - material requisition, usage, and proper storage. Making quick decisions to solve problems and maintain work progress. Benefits: Salary: 2500 - 4000 Saudi Riyal + Food + Accommodation + OT Accommodation and Food: Provided by the company Working Hours: 10 hours per day Other Benefits: Company will provide transportation and insurance Overtime: As per Saudi labor law üìå Qualifications: (Please read the details carefully before applying for the job) ======================================== Educational Qualification: Diploma/ B.Sc in Civil Engineering Certification: Preference will be given to candidates with relevant professional certificates or training. Experience: 3 to 5 years of work experience. Candidates with GCC/foreign work experience will be preferred. Language: Must be able to speak basic English or Arabic. üìÜ Delegate Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) Additional Information: Visa Contract Period: 2 years - Renewable Passport: All candidates must bring both new and old passports for the interview. The passport must have a minimum validity of 1.5 years. Candidates without a passport should not apply. Payment Terms: Payment will be made after obtaining the visa

Responsibilities: Job Description: 1. Providing quality customer service by effectively communicating with customers to answer questions.
2. Communicating and responding effectively to customer questions, locating merchandise, and providing requested assistance on merchandise.
3. Ensuring a safe and clean environment by maintaining safety standards, maintenance, and cleanliness as required by the department.
4. Maintaining the overall appearance of the bakery area by keeping merchandise and displays fully stocked, properly signed, neat, clean, and organized.
5. Following established procedures to process damaged goods, merchandise left behind, and outdated bakery merchandise.
6. Cake Writing skill.
7. Maintain health, safety, and security of the customer.
8. Ensure the best customer service.
9. Prepare, Decorate, and Service the food.
10. Ensure payment from the customer.
11. Maintain the cleaning and hygiene of the outlet.

Responsibilities: Summary: Pubali Bank PLC is hiring skilled and proactive individuals for the expansion of Pi Banking services. Selected candidates will be involved in the activation of merchant registration and QR services at the bank. Location: Candidates will work in their respective areas (opportunity to work locally). Responsibilities: 1. Assist customers in opening savings and current accounts. 2. Verify KYC (Know Your Customer) documents such as trade license, national ID, photos, and application forms as per Bangladesh Bank's guidelines. 3. Provide other account-related services (ATM card, checkbook, mobile banking). 4. Enter complete information into the system including address, bank account, and transaction profiles. 5. Capture and upload photos of merchants. 6. Ensure necessary signatures on contracts with merchants. 7. Deposit documents at the relevant branch and complete the QR code issuance process. Qualifications and Skills: ‚òÖ Must have knowledge of using smartphones and the internet. ‚òÖ Should have a mindset for marketing work. ‚òÖ Must be skilled in communication and confident. ‚òÖ Should have an understanding of local shops and business establishments. Target and Salary: Minimum of 60 merchant accounts If the target is achieved, the monthly salary will be ‡ß≥16,000. Special Benefits: Incentive/commission based on target achievement Possibility of permanent employment based on good performance. Note: No financial transactions are involved in the position of QR Executive Officer.

Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets by planning and executing focused sales activities. Develop and implement effective sales strategies to grow revenue and expand market presence. Generate and qualify leads through online and direct marketing initiatives. Identify new business opportunities by conducting market visits and proactive client outreach. Maintain regular follow-up with existing and potential clients to nurture relationships and close deals. Deliver clear, persuasive presentations and demonstrations tailored to customer needs. Manage a portfolio of customers through face-to-face visits and personalized engagement. Use Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint, email, and online research to prepare reports, presentations, and track sales activity. Collaborate with colleagues to share market insights, coordinate efforts, and support team objectives. Communicate professionally and courteously, demonstrating strong interpersonal and presentation skills. Stay composed under pressure, prioritize tasks effectively, and meet deadlines with a positive attitude. Adapt quickly to change, learn on the go, and embrace feedback to continuously improve performance. Freshers are encouraged to apply and will receive support to develop their sales skills and product knowledge.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Establishment: S K Corporation
Workplace: Mirpur Kazipara, Dhaka
Salary: 20,000 - 25,000 Taka (Negotiable)

S K Corporation is looking to hire a skilled, experienced, and responsible Chief Accountant to strengthen and organize their accounting department.

Responsibilities:
- Ensure timely and controlled accounting operations of the organization.
- Prepare and verify Purchase, Sales, Inventory, Trial Balance, and Final Accounts.
- Maintain and regularly update Journal, Ledger, Cash Book, and Purchase-Sales accounts.
- Prepare Salary Sheet, Provident Fund (PF), Incentives, and other benefit accounts.
- Manage VAT, Tax, and other legal matters appropriately.
- Prepare and present monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports to the management.
- Coordinate and reconcile accounts of multiple branches and head office.
- Visit various branches as needed for inventory and accounting purposes.

Educational Qualifications:
- Bachelor's/Master's degree in Accounting or Finance.
- Candidates with CA/CCA/MBA (Accounting) will be given preference.

Experience:
- Minimum 1-3 years of experience in the accounting department.
- Experience in managing accounts of multiple branches and head office.
- Practical experience in complete accounting cycle management.

Required Skills:
- Must have experience working with ERP Software Odoo.
- Mandatory experience with Tally Prime/ERP 9.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Excel (Vlookup, Pivot Table, Macro) is required.
- Advantageous to have experience working with other accounting software.
- Ability to identify and resolve accounting discrepancies.

Personal Qualities:
- Integrity, responsibility, and professional attitude.
- Leadership and team coordination skills.
- Ability to work under pressure.
- Effective communication skills.

Other Requirements:
- Generally aged between 30-45 years (flexible based on experience).
- Both male and female candidates are encouraged to apply.

Application Process:
Interested candidates are requested to mention their previous job responsibilities and achievements clearly in the CV.
Contact: 01823-064555

Responsibilities: Greetings to all customers and address their inquiries and complaints. Maintain cleanliness and safety of the outlet. Monitor product stock and assist the showroom manager in preparing a demand requisition to be submitted to the Area Manager. Build relationships with clients by providing product information, suggesting new products, and implementing service improvements. Receive and inspect products from suppliers and affix product barcodes. Assist the showroom manager in preparing the daily sales report to be sent to the Area Manager. Open and close the showroom on time and ensure all electricity is turned off at closing.

Greetings, every customer, and respond to their inquiries and complaints. Maintain the outlet‚Äôs cleanliness and safety. Check the product‚Äôs stock and assist the showroom manager in preparing a demand requisition for submitting it to the Area manager. Maintain a relationship with clients by providing product information, recommending new products, and making service improvements. Responsibilities: Team Leader:
1. Provide maximum cooperation to the team leader in all tasks.
2. Manage and complete assigned tasks of fiber team members in the absence of the team leader.
3. Perform tasks such as fiber splicing, dressing fiber boxes, OTDR testing, power checking, router configuration, etc.
4. Provide utmost support to the team leader to efficiently complete assigned tasks using one's own skills as needed by the company.
5. Teach all team members necessary tasks so that the team can complete their assigned tasks efficiently in the absence of any member.
6. Ensure the quality of work.
7. Adhere to office rules and regulations and foster the same mentality among other team members.
8. Work for the company in case of any emergency.
9. Share necessary information and images with the Head Office Co-ordinator for each task. Also, provide reports on the team's used and remaining inventory and provide adequate support.
10. Ensure that each fiber technician is provided with designated and supplied attire, helmet, shoes, belt, and gloves for work convenience and safety.

Minimum Qualifications and Experience:
1. Must be able to read and pronounce English writing.
2. Must have at least 1 year of experience working as a co-team leader or leading a team.
3. Must have experience working with splicing machines, OTDR, power meters, splitters, ONUs, MCIs, modulars, fibers, Wi-Fi routers, etc.
4. Must be able to communicate, take photos, and share on a smartphone.
5. Priority will be given to those who have passed SSC/HSC.
6. Must be hardworking and honest.

Job Type:
Full-time

Working Hours:
9 hours

Shift:
Day shift

Company Benefits:
- Tour Allowance
- T/A
- Over Time Allowance
- Provident Fund
- Partially Subsidized Lunch Facilities
- Yearly Salary Review

Responsibilities: Responsibilities and Duties:
- Conducting promotional activities for the organization and its products
- Creating new clients and maintaining relationships with existing clients
- Assisting in sales growth and market analysis
- Actively working to achieve set targets
- Preparing daily reports and presenting them to the authorities
- Listening to customer queries and complaints, providing appropriate solutions, and ensuring satisfaction
- Preparing sales progress reports and submitting them to the team leader
- Coordinating with other departments to enhance customer experience and retention

- Must be hardworking, sincere, and self-confident
- Should have excellent communication skills and convincing abilities
- Interested in marketing and sales-related work and be transparent in teamwork
- Skill in creating new clients and maintaining relationships with existing clients
- Willing and capable of participating in field visits in any area
- Ability to actively participate in sales and market analysis

job_title: Digital Marketing Executive (Real Estate & Property Background Preferable)
job_description:
Responsibilities: Mannan & Associates Properties Ltd. is looking to hire a skilled and experienced digital marketer for online promotion and lead generation of our real estate projects.

Responsibilities:
- Conducting and optimizing marketing campaigns on various digital platforms including Facebook, Instagram, and Google
- Managing Facebook Page and Ads Manager
- Creating engaging content (post captions, ad copies, video ideas)
- Increasing real estate lead generation and conversion
- Analyzing campaign performance and preparing reports
- Ensuring coordination with the sales team for lead follow-up
- Staying updated on new digital marketing trends and tools

Requirements: üéØ Qualifications: Real-life experience as a digital marketer (prior experience in real estate is a plus) Good understanding of Facebook Ads and Google Ads Basic knowledge of SEO and content marketing Skills in data analysis and campaign optimization Strong communication and time management skills Creative and capable of problem-solving üéì Educational Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing/Business or related field (flexible in terms of experience) üí∞ Salary and Benefits: Salary: Negotiable Performance bonus Professional and friendly work environment Opportunities for career growth

- Must have a Bachelor's degree from a recognized university.
- However, if the candidate's performance and skills are excellent, educational qualifications may be relaxed.

- Preference will be given to experienced candidates in teaching.

- Salary will be determined based on discussion.
- Other benefits will be provided according to the institution's policy.
- Accommodation and meal arrangements are available.

**Application Process:**
Interested candidates are requested to apply with their CV.

Bright Future Model School

Responsibilities: Responsibilities of the security personnel:
- Providing top-level security to the senior executive during office hours, travel time, meetings, and public appearances to ensure personal safety and maintain utmost confidentiality and professionalism.
Responsibilities include:
- Providing close protection to the VIP at the office, residence, and during travel.
- Carrying and using approved firearms as per the law.
- Assessing potential threats, ensuring safe movement and secure routes.
- Ensuring the security of the senior executive during meetings, events, and public appearances.
- Constant surveillance of the surroundings and identifying potential security risks.
- Taking prompt and effective action in case of any security threat or emergency situation.
- Coordinating with drivers, security personnel, and law enforcement agencies when necessary.
- Maintaining strict confidentiality of all information related to the VIP's movements and activities.
- Ensuring proper care, security, and safekeeping of firearms and security equipment.
- Submitting daily duty logs and incident reports as required.

Requirements: Age: 39 to 55 years. Salary: Negotiable. Experience: Must have at least 05 years of practical experience as a singer or armed security personnel. Educational Qualification: SSC/HSC. Responsibilities: - Provide comprehensive secretarial and administrative support to the Managing Director, anticipating needs and prioritizing tasks to enable efficient decision-making.
- Manage the MD‚Äôs diary, schedule meetings and appointments, and optimize time allocation across competing priorities.
- Coordinate meeting logistics, prepare agendas and briefing materials, and ensure participants receive timely information.
- Record clear, accurate meeting minutes and track action items to completion through timely follow-up.
- Draft, edit, and format reports, presentations, and official correspondence with attention to clarity and professionalism.
- Handle incoming communications‚Äîscreen emails and calls, respond or redirect appropriately, and maintain prompt follow-up.
- Arrange travel and accommodation, prepare itineraries and visa documentation, and manage related expense records.
- Maintain confidential files and records securely, ensuring organized filing and controlled access.
- Liaise proactively with internal teams and external stakeholders to coordinate activities, share information, and resolve issues.
- Support ad hoc projects and special requests with a cooperative, solutions-focused approach to deliver timely results.

Requirements: - Proven experience as a Personal Secretary/Executive Assistant preferred
- Excellent communication skills in Bangla & English
- Strong computer skills (MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Email)
- Smart, well-organized, and able to maintain confidentiality
- Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks
